name: News Tick-O-Matic
author: Twinpictures

sections.description: jQuery animated WordPress widget that displays the newest of news in a a silky smooth scrolling news ticker in the sidebar. Full documentation is available to delight and inform. Need help? Check out the excellent, free community support here on WordPress. Need a heaping’ helping’ of help? Premium support is available for at crazy low rates.
sections.installation:
1. Old-school: upload the News Tick-O-Matic plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via FTP.
  2. Hipster: Ironically add the plugin via the WordPress Plugins menu.
  3. Activate the Plugin
  4. Add the widget to the sidebar and fiddle with the options.
  5. Test that the plugin meets your demanding needs.
  6. Tweak the CSS to taste.
  7. Rate the plugin and verify if it works at https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/news-tick-o-matic/
  8. Leave a comment regarding bugs, feature request, cocktail recipes at https://wordpress.org/tags/news-tick-o-matic
